DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study : Gene Expression Profiling Immune Response HBV Vaccination Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Vaccines responsible prevent million death extend average human lifespan . Effective vaccine stimulate cell immune system activate gene associate function bring protective immunity . Knowledge gene cellular function activate effective vaccination improve understand immune system work define feature necessary successful vaccine response . This study aim define cellular function important hepatitis B ( HBV ) vaccine immune response healthy individual . The investigator identify gene activate suppressed immune cell various time dose HBV vaccine . The investigator explore vaccine-induced `` gene signature '' characterize cellular function associate effective immune response HBV vaccination . The investigator hypothesize many gene associate innate adaptive immune function important effective HBV vaccine response .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer without significant medical problem Willing receive three dos FDAapproved Hepatitis B vaccine Male female < 18 > 60 year age Received vaccine within month prior study vaccine History Hepatitis B infection History previous Hepatitis B vaccination ( ) History HCV infection positive HCV antibody test Participation another clinical study investigational product currently within past 90 day , expect participation study Positive serum antibody Hep B surface antigen and/or core Hep B core antigen HIV positive In opinion investigator , volunteer unlikely comply study protocol Any clinically significant abnormality medical history physical examination include history immunodeficiency autoimmune disease Is pregnant lactate Currently take systemic steroid immunomodulatory medication include anticancer medication antiviral medication Any clinically significant acute chronic medical condition require care primary care provider ( e.g. , diabetes , coronary artery disease , rheumatologic illness , malignancy , substance abuse ) , opinion investigator , would preclude participation Unable continue participation 30 week
